NO HAY HALF LIFE 3

Всегда было интересно, как работает движок игры (особенно от Valve). В этой, скажем так, "игре" нам демонстрируются различные фишки движка Source (второй движок от Valve). Особенно интересно проходить с комментариями разработчиков (там описываются как сделали ту или иную вещь, и как она работает). 

P.s. В конце "игры" сказали писать на рабочую почту Гейба Ньюэлла (один из основателей кампании Valve), если сообществу понравились такого рода "экскурсии", жаль, что мало кто написал, потому что "экскурсия" по движку Source 2 (CS:GO, Half-Life: Alyx и т.д.) так и не была выпущена(

This is such a nice tech demo of sorts. It's not too often you see unfinished/scrapped projects like this released. I'm a sucker for developer commentary, and getting to go through seeing all of the effort put into these games makes me appreciate them just that much more.

fisherman

A "lost" side quest from Half Life 2. This software is more or less a demo version for the Half-Life 2 games to test if the PC you're playing with is compatible with the software and its game engine. This game is only less than 1 GB and can be finished for a minimum of 30 mins. In short, if its laggy means your device isn't compatible with the Half-Life 2 games. Otherwise, congrats! You can enjoy playing the rest of the Half-Life 2 games.

Yeah it's a nice little minor thing.

A half an hour playthrough which includes a unique dedushka NPC(in a way that we won't see him again), ambush with a squad of standard Alliance troopers, two or three headcrabs, one helicopter boss fight and zero reasons for Gordon to actually be on the Lost Coast. Valve didn't even bother to add achievements.

An okay mini-game, but not worth a purchase, unless it's included in Half-Life 2 collection pack.

portal 2 den sonra bu demo ya daldım. Bu demo dan pek bir beklentim yoktu lakin güzel demo olmuş altyazılar yok bu yüzden bazı terimleri anlamakta zorlandım. teknolojiyi anlamak için oynamıştım aslında ama altyazı olmamasından mütevellit pek bişey anlayamadım. Bir köylü halkına baskına gelen combine askerlerini durdumamaız küçük bir senaryo oynamanızı tavsiye ederim eğer ingilizceniz iyiyse ve source' yi merak ediyorsanız tabii. Artık bilgisayarıma söz verdiğim gibi onu 2 haftalık izne gönderebilirim.
